Module com.cbodo.schedule
Package com.cbodo.schedule.util

Class FormValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cbodo.schedule.util.FormValidator
  • public class FormValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class assists in building the forms for adding/updating appointments and customers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean isInUS
      Lambda expression used to make it easier to check if a Locale is in the United States.
      static java.lang.String operatingHours
      String used with displaying time related errors, when the time is outside business hours.
      static java.lang.String ZONE
      Stores the company's time zone.

      • hasAConflict

        public static boolean hasAConflict​(java.time.ZonedDateTime newStart,
                                   java.time.ZonedDateTime newEnd,
                                   java.time.ZonedDateTime oldStart,
                                   java.time.ZonedDateTime oldEnd)
        Checks if appointment has conflicts for the customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        newStart - Start time of new appointment.
        newEnd - End time of new appointment.
        oldStart - Start time of existing appointment.
        oldEnd - End time of existing appointment.
        Returns:
        Boolean result of check.
